getJuror(address).details: Gets a specified juror's properties, taking into account delayed set stakes. Note that subcourt IDs are shifted by 1 so that 0 can be "empty".
getJuror(address).return: The juror's properties, taking into account delayed set stakes.

stakeOf(address,uint96).details: Gets the stake of a specified juror in a specified subcourt, taking into account delayed set stakes.
